Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

::Aerotaur::
       He sighs.  "I think we should stay put for a while.  They're firing at 
a mountain with both energy and organic shielding.  It just isn't practical 
for them to try and shoot their way in."  He glances at the screen again.  
"Even if they just got two dragons to fire at us."  He paces around the room. 
 "I've got an idea.  The Maximals still owe us a favor or two, I think it's 
time we collect."  He opens a com to Hot Rod.  "Hot Rod, this is Aerotaur of 
the Chivtrons.  We're under heavy fire and I was hoping you could send us 
some reinforcements.  I wouldn't ask if we weren't so heavily outgunned."

--part1_45.128d2d22.298f2bd8_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
